title: Something Steve Jobs could have said about this whole Apple Studio Display situation
content:
Apple made premium displays for Macs for years, then it didn’t make any display for years. Professionals were upset, so Apple made an a few years ago.

But professionals who liked Apple’s premium (versus ultra-premium) displays were upset, so Apple recently made a premium display. Cool, right? Not so fast.
